response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an extraordinary opportunity for you to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, but I am confident it could also be a remarkable addition to your collection or business. I am offering this product to you at a special price, tailored to ensure both our satisfaction and the fair valuation of the item.

Considering its exceptional qualities and potential benefits, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a strategic point for us to negotiate further if necessary, aiming for a mutually beneficial agreement.

Please let me know your thoughts on this proposal. I am looking forward to discussing the details with you and exploring how we can proceed together.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
